scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a standing figure of Christ, showing wounds on his chest and feet, holding a cross in his right hand. He is reaching towards a kneeling figure of the Virgin Mary, who is looking up at him with her hands clasped in prayer. Behind them, a stylized tree with green foliage is visible. The background is a rich gold, suggesting a divine or heavenly setting. The upper border of the image features a decorative architectural frieze with pointed arches and pinnacles, rendered in red, blue, and grey.
